description: Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany and Prime Minister Stefan Lofven of Sweden say the European Union needs to have a collective response to the ongoing migrant crisis.
title: Leaders Call for E.U. to Help Migrants
title_page: Leaders Call for E.U. to Help Migrants - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany and Prime Minister Stefan Lofven of Sweden say the European Union needs to have a collective response to the ongoing migrant crisis.
